item.title: How I flipped a coin to decide on my grad school
item.description: So you decided to do a PhD, applied to a few schools, and visited schools you got accepted to now. Now comes the hard part of the process: deciding which school you’re going to spend the next 5+ years at. While I cannot provide a checklist or a simple answer, I can talk about my experience when deciding on which school I should go to and a few questions that I answered while making that decision.
